snippet.title: Wayfinder - Grendel - Character Trailer - Play Now!
snippet.description:
Grendel has finally made his way into the world of Evenor.

Introducing the ferocious mercenary, Grendel! Unveiled at Tokyo Game Show 2023, Grendel charges into battle as the latest playable Wayfinder. Directed by Joaquim Dos Santos (Spider-Man: Across The Spider-Verse and The Legend of Korra) and Barry J. Kelly (Star Trek: Lower Decks, Venture Bros), this explosive short by 5 Count Productions, illustrates why it's best to stay on Grendel's good side. If only he had one...

Wayfinder is Available Now!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1171690/Wayfinder/
